TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID.description: Your Twilio account's unique identifier, found here: https://www.twilio.com/user/account

TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN.description: Your Twilio account's secret key, found here: https://www.twilio.com/user/account

TWILIO_CALLER_ID.description: A Twilio number assigned to your account in E.164 format, found here: https://www.twilio.com/user/account/phone-numbers/incoming

TWILIO_ALERTS.description: A Twilio configuration whether or not to send sms (0 - no sms, 1 - sms)

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: An Amazon webservice key found in your AWS dashboard

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: An Amazon webservice key found in your AWS dashboars

S3_HEAD_BUCKET.description: The bucket you created in S3 for all of your video files

FLASK_DEBUG.description: Log level (0, no erros outputed to log not recommended)

FLASK_PASSWORD.description: The password for the flask server default is typically admin

FLASK_SECRET_KEY.description: Key required for auth library, enter anything super secret

FLASK_USERNAME.description: The username for your administrator account typically admin
